https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/diUckySGz17KNFAdNiPc3Wm36dJ.jpg In a small mining community in Northern Sweden, a group of youngsters about to take the leap in the adult age fight with themselves and the world around, while the ground literally trembles under their feet. Broken Hill Blues
